naming_conventions.styles: use index.css or component.module.css where necessary

folder_structure_rules.src/components: component UI pieces; subfolders for domain areas (auth, layouts, ui)
folder_structure_rules.src/pages: route-level pages grouped by role (admin, public, student, auth)
folder_structure_rules.src/hooks: custom hooks in camelCase files (e.g., useAuth.ts)

code_generation_rules: Always follow PRD and PRD 2 for architecture decisions
Prefer creating new files under existing folders matching the structure above
Component files must use PascalCase and export a default React component
Keep tests next to implementation or in a __tests__ folder
Add environment placeholders to any code that requires secrets (e.g., process.env.SUPABASE_URL)
Include an entry in README or CHANGELOG for any significant generated artifacts
